short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically counts your Google search results and displays the number of results in the title of the result.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do not forget to enable counter upon installation!

Google Results Counter is a simple extension that enhances your Google Search Results with the ranking number besides every link.

In the beginning it was developed by a team member from Collabwriting that made the extension for our marketing team to help us track our ranking and competition but then we decided to launch it public for all.

Features
- Adds ranking number to every google search result
- Adds ranking numbers to images in google search
- Ignores promotional materials and ads
- Popup Settings has a promotional banner for Collabwriting with a link to it - Feel free to give it a try as well üòÑ

This is not our main product, but please feel free to reach out with any suggestions or challenges you encounter üçÄ
